description:

title: stack trace when instance_actions extension can not find instance in GET

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/30096
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/30096
Committed: http://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/8eede5e9814f3305e0bb66eeb93623ba25b16e9a
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 8eede5e9814f3305e0bb66eeb93623ba25b16e9a
Author: Chris Yeoh <email address hidden>
Date:   Wed May 22 21:52:25 2013 +0930

    Catch InstanceNotFound in instance_actions GET
    
    Catch the InstanceNotFound exception in the instance_actions
    index function and handle the error gracefully so a stacktrace is
    not generated in the log files. This patch does not change the
    API
    
    Fixes bug 1182867
    
    Change-Id: I0764f8abda7176deefe0d103bd86acd0af78780d
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

commit a16db707c1722c87f29eacd20d5d359c37968c3f
Author: Chris Yeoh <email address hidden>
Date:   Wed May 22 21:52:25 2013 +0930

    Catch InstanceNotFound in instance_actions GET
    
    Catch the InstanceNotFound exception in the instance_actions
    index function and handle the error gracefully so a stacktrace is
    not generated in the log files. This patch does not change the
    API
    
    Fixes bug 1182867
    
    Change-Id: I0764f8abda7176deefe0d103bd86acd0af78780d
    (cherry picked from commit 8eede5e9814f3305e0bb66eeb93623ba25b16e9a)
